data.title: [Middle - Senior] Backend Developer (PHP, Laravel, MySQL )
data.content: Responsible for overseeing the development and maintenance of the server side, implementing backend services in the platform, involved in the entire product development lifecycle. Develop the new features and improve the current one, aim to the best services which can serve to users. Concurrently, this position needs to ensure consistency, stability and quality within the systema &the product

data.title: IT Comtor up to $1.000
data.content:
The Comtor team is highly focused on development and boasts a high level of cohesion among its members.

This position is open to experienced candidates - from 1 YOE, and your salary will be determined based on your practical abilities.

HOPEE also welcomes freshers, who will receive training from a passionate and talented team lead. You will be trained in all the necessary IT Comtor skills and work with Japanese clients on a daily basis.

This position provides opportunities for growth into a BrSE or PM role, depending on your personal aspirations.

benefits.value: Unlimited bonus fund
Review performance every 6 months or whenever you achieve outstanding achievement
Month 13th salary, Insurance (PVI insurance extra), annual days off, …
Be provided with the necessary equipment to work likes Macbook Pro or anything you need more
Coffee and snack

Many cultural activities for you to enjoy: Birthday party, Welcome party, Team building events or monthly company party, Company trip, Free in-house entertainment facilities (football, table-football, boxing…)
Manager is super comfortable and cares about employees, no need to find a way to balance work and life

data.title: Senior QC Engineer
data.content:
YouNet Media is a member of  YouNet Group -  the leading SocialTech Group creating value for enterprises by applying Social Technologies in a variety of business areas including sales, marketing, and operations.

YouNet Media is the leading Social Media Analytics Platform and Services company owing the No1. Social Suite in market: Social Listening, Social Influencer, Social Trends, etc. 

We are looking for one Senior QC Engineer who will join our team to make the great products to market.

benefits.value: Competitive salary and 13th-month salary payment
Annual Health-check to make sure you are always healthy
Premium Health Care package so you don’t have to spend money when you are sick
Young, Dynamic and Challenging working environment
Work time: Mon - Fri (8h30-12h00, 13h30-18h00)

value: Must have:
4+ years of experience testing with web applications.
Significant experience with manual testing of complex applications required.
Experience in creating and implementing test strategies and detailed test plans, test cases.
Experience in APIs tests using dedicated tools such as Postman.
Experience in working with databases like Solr, Mysql, Elasticsearch, MongoDB,..
Strong self-discipline, careful and logical thinking.
Teamwork, problem-solving skills and willingness to share with other team members.
Excellent communication, motivational and collaboration skills.
Nice to have:
Experience in performing performance tests using dedicated tools such as Jmeter is a plus.
Experience with automation testing is a plus.
Experience with security testing is a plus.

data.title: Software Localization QA Engineer
data.content:
Job Highlights

  • Opportunity to grow regionally with the Company
  • Exposure to platforms supporting > 1 billion users.

Job Description

  • Job Title: Software Localization QA Engineer
  • Location: Vietnam (Remotely working from home, must be native Vietnam)
  • Employment: Full Time Contractor (renewal on a yearly basis)

benefits.value: Opportunity to grow regionally with the Company
Exposure to platforms supporting > 1 billion users
Working time: Mon - Fri (Morning: 10:00 - 12:00, Afternoon: 13:00 - 19:00)

full_addresses: Work remotely from home in Vietnam, Remote

collection_addresses.full_address: Work remotely from home in Vietnam, Remote
collection_addresses.street: Work remotely from home in Vietnam

value: Required Qualifications: (Education, Technical Skills / Knowledge)
1-3 year working experience in server level/ client testing experience, software manual testing and have good knowledge ofQA methodology and tools.
Have good case design ability and problem positioning ability.
Ability to understand and execute test cases.
English communication for reading and writing and strong analytical problem-solving skill.
Has a profound understanding of the local culture.
Chinese speaking is a plus.
Optional Qualifications: (Education, Technical Skills/Knowledge)
Experience on Python and Shell programming
Experience on test tools/framework such as Charles, UIAutomator or Appium .
Willing to learn new technology and open mind for sharing is a plus
Bachelor in computer science or software engineering, Master Degree considered as a plus
Processing compliance awareness, familiar with such as GDPR or other data privacy regulations.

benefits.value: Mức lương thỏa thuận theo năng lực và công việc
